main event: A bright light was observed in the sky, moving quickly and disappearing.
interesting points: The object was described as a sparkling bright white light, much brighter than the brightest stars.
The object appeared to move faster than 15 miles per hour and was estimated to be about 600 miles away.
The object was observed for a total duration of about 2 seconds before suddenly disappearing.
The witness was a radar operator who had previous experience observing aircraft and other objects in the sky.
Multiple witnesses observed the object, including the witness's children.
